install.name: impacto
install.author: Casey Lee
install.description: Thanks for purchasing the Impacto Joomla template!

param.name: headerstyle
param.label: Header Type
param.description: Header display method: Image should be 32-bit transparent PNG or must match body background image.

param.name: header_top_pad
param.label: Header Top Padding
param.description: Adds margin to the top of your logo

param.name: header_bot_pad
param.label: Header Bottom Padding
param.description: Adds margin to the bottom of your logo

param.name: headline
param.label: Site Title
param.description: The site title is rendered for SEO purposes so it is important to custommize this regardless of 'text' or 'graphic' Header Mode (configured above).

param.name: tagline
param.default: A sleek and professional Joomla Template
param.label: Tagline
param.description: The site description is rendered for SEO purposes so it is important to custommize this regardless of 'text' or 'graphic' Header Mode (configured above).

param.name: style
param.label: Theme Style
param.description: Select the color style to display

param.name: layoutstyle
param.label: Layout Style
param.description: Column Display Order: (SEO Note: Source ordering is not a factor here. Your content will always appear first in Google.)

param.name: leftcolwidth
param.label: Left Column Width
param.description: Width of the left module column

param.name: rightcolwidth
param.label: Right Column Width
param.description: Width of the right module column

param.name: footerheight
param.label: Footer Height
param.description: This template footer uses a clearing method called 'sticky footer' which keeps the footer at the bottom of the page at all times. You must set the height of your footer here.

param.name: mootools_enabled
param.label: Mootools Enabled
param.description: Force enabling/disabling of Mootools. You can safely disable this if you do not plan on using the frontend editing capabilities of Joomla! or do not have any third party components that rely on the mootools library.

param.name: caption_enabled
param.label: Captions Enabled
param.description: Force disabling of Captions JavaScript, Mootools is required for Captions to work.
